name: Touhou: Heart of the Tiger
description:
How does the highly revered Buddhist Monk Shou Toramaru spend her nights? ...By drinking at bars! Explore Shou's past and present as she helps different Touhou characters sort out their relationships in this visual novel (with minigames)!

Features

  • Three Acts of romantic hijinx and struggles.
  • Minigames that help empower the narrative.
  • An All Star team full of a ton of Touhou Game Dev's heavy hitters.

Changelog

  • V1.01: Fixed issues where certain players in specific countries could not progress through certain parts of the game (if you had a white screen at act 1, then this is fixed now).
